Package edu.uoc.uocnejitos.view.cmd

Class CmdApp

java.lang.Object
edu.uoc.uocnejitos.view.cmd.CmdApp
public class CmdApp
extends java.lang.Object

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) Game game
    Game object that allows to manage the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    CmdApp()
    Initializes a new game with the folder which contains the levels' configuration files and with the game mode "turns".

  • Field Details

    • game

      Game game
      Game object that allows to manage the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • CmdApp

      public CmdApp() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException
      Initializes a new game with the folder which contains the levels' configuration files and with the game mode "turns".
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When the level's configuration file is not found.
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.

  • Method Details

    • launchGame

      public void launchGame() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException
      Manages the idle process of the game.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When the level's configuration file is not found.
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.

    • coordinateFromInput

      private Coordinate coordinateFromInput​(java.lang.String input)
      Transform an user input (String) in the corresponding Coordinate object.
      Parameters:
      input - User input (captured from the keyboard) with the format rowColumn, e.g. "a1".
      Returns:
      Coordinate object that corresponds to the user input.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method: entry point of the program.
      Parameters:
      args - This parameter is not needed.
